title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 1 - Schedule of Addresses and Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 1 - Schedule of Addresses and Fees

State Regulations
§ 1.1 - Contacting the new york state banking department; other agencies; availability of documents, version 3
§ 1.2 - Schedule of fees; payment, version 3

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 1

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §
12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
